headline: AI for Sustainable Urban Development
bioMarkdown:
Hi, I'm Ce Hou ðŸ‘‹. I am currently a Ph.D. candidate at ![UST Logo](/icon/hkust.svg) [Hong Kong University of Science and Technology](https://hkust.edu.hk/) and a Visiting Scholar at ![PKU Logo](/icon/pku.png) [Peking University](https://hkust.edu.hk/), supervised by [Prof. Fan Zhang](https://scholar.google.com/citations?hl=zh-CN&user=dc1TzLoAAAAJ) and [Prof. Sen Li](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=U56wNGYAAAAJ&hl=en). I received my Bachelor's degree from ![WHU Logo](/icon/whu.png) [Wuhan University](https://www.nju.edu.cn/en/) and my Master's degree from ![UCL Logo](/icon/ucl.webp) [University College London](https://www.nju.edu.cn/en/). Starting in March 2026, I will be a Visiting Student at ![UC Berkeley Logo](/icon/ucb.png) [University of California, Berkeley](https://www.berkeley.edu/), working with [Prof. Lu Liang](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=rFXEMY4AAAAJ&hl=zh-CN). For more background information, please refer to my [CV](./CV.pdf).

ðŸ”¬ My research interest lies in: **Leveraging urban multi-modal data and advanced AI methods (e.g., Large Language Models) to support sustainable urban development**
blogTagline: Thoughts on AI, software, life and more. Short notes and longer write-ups.
